actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Walsh-Healey Act to provide that, where the majority of the employees of an employer to whom that Act applies by secret ballot elect to do so, the employees of that contractor may work 10 hours in each day if they do not work in excess of 40 hours in any one week.

summary.text: Amends the Walsh-Healey Act to permit government contractors to have their employees work ten-hour workdays if the employees choose such workday and the resulting workweek does not exceed 40 hours.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Walsh-Healey Act to provide that, where the majority of the employees of an employer to whom that Act applies by secret ballot elect to do so, the employees of that contractor may work 10 hours in each day if they do not work in excess of 40 hours in any one week.
